thread.title: BRIEF-M Iii Acquisition Corp. Announces New Meeting Date For The Special Meeting Of Stockholders

title: BRIEF-M Iii Acquisition Corp. Announces New Meeting Date For The Special Meeting Of Stockholders
text: March 2, 2018 / 12:34 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-M Iii Acquisition Corp. Announces New Meeting Date For The Special Meeting Of Stockholders Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 2 (Reuters) - M Iii Acquisition Corp: * M III ACQUISITION CORP. ANNOUNCES NEW MEETING DATE FOR THE SPECIAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS TO APPROVE PROPOSED BUSINESS COMBINATION WITH IEA ENERGY SERVICES LLC * M III ACQUISITION - ‍ NEW MEETING DATE FOR SPECIAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS RESCHEDULED TO MARCH 12, 2018, AT 10:00 A.M., ET * M III ACQUISITION CORP - ‍RECORD DATE FOR SPECIAL MEETING HAS NOT CHANGED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
